definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: This article describes briefly the preparation technology and the main performance of waterborne high temperature anticorrosion coatings.
sentences.chinese: 简述了水性高温防腐涂料的制备工艺及主要性能。

sentences.english: Corrosion Preventing of Saturator Using Epoxy Glass-Fibre Cloth.
sentences.chinese: 饱和器环氧玻璃钢防腐蚀实用新技术。

sentences.english: Some additives and preservatives are essential to keep foods quality and freshness.
sentences.chinese: 一些添加剂和防腐剂都必须保持食品的品质与鲜度。

sentences.english: Guizhou Beipan concrete cable-stayed bridge anti-corrosion engineering.
sentences.chinese: 贵州北盘江斜拉桥混凝土防腐工程。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the research advances of polyaniline anticorrosion coatings and different mechanisms of anticorrosion.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了聚苯胺防腐涂料的研究进展及不同的防腐机理。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the research advances of polyaniline anticorrosion coatings and different mechanisms of anticorrosion.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了聚苯胺防腐涂料的研究进展及不同的防腐机理。

sentences.english: Parametersoff corrosion proof three-function valve and its develolpment are introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了防腐三用阀的性能参数，及其研究过程。

sentences.english: In many instances, antiseptics, anti -mildew agents etc. might be added to the recipe.
sentences.chinese: 在许多情况下，配方中要加人防腐剂，防霉剂等。

sentences.english: No parabens, aluminum, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances or harsh preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 没有苯甲酸酯，铝，丙二醇，合成香料或防腐剂苛刻。

sentences.english: Corrosion-free due to the use of high grade fluoropolymers.
sentences.chinese: 采用高质量的含氟化合物，防腐蚀。

sentences.english: The expansion process of heat-shrinkable sleeve was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了管道防腐用热缩圆套的扩张工艺。

sentences.english: This paper studied the antiseptic and fresh- keeping technology of pasteurized neutral milk beverage.
sentences.chinese: 研究了巴氏杀菌中性乳饮料的防腐保鲜技术。

sentences.english: Antimicrobial active endophytes strains from Pseudolarix kaempferi Gord are potential resources for foods antiseptic.
sentences.chinese: 金钱松内生真菌抗菌活性是潜在的食品防腐抗菌资源。

sentences.english: The obtained topcoat shows good weatherability and anti -corrosion property.
sentences.chinese: 该面漆具有优良的耐候性能和防腐蚀性能。

sentences.english: The method of extracting natural preservative in aniseed(Illicium verum Hook. f. ) and its bacteriostasis were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了八角中天然防腐剂的提取方法和抑菌作用。

sentences.english: This kind of steel pipe inner wall anticorrosive paint brush IPN8710 major general.
sentences.chinese: 此种钢管一般内壁主要刷IPN8710防腐涂料。
